public class MorePractice {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		for(int i=0;i<=3;i++){
			
			System.out.println(" ");
			
			
			for(int j=0;j<=i;j++) {
				
				System.out.print(" "+i);
				
				System.out.print(" "+j);
				
			}
			
			
			
		}
		
		
		
		
	}

}
